V04prmosulu:3: buddhena lokārthacareṇa tāyinā sudeśitaṃ prātimokṣaṃ vidunā // 1 //
V04prmosulu:4: taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śrutvāna dhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitaṃ /
V04prmosulu:6: cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddhotpādaṃ mānuṣikāñ ca śraddhāṃ /
V04prmosulu:8: śīlena yukto śramaṇo 'tiveti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo 'tiveti /
V04prmosulu:9: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ // 4 //
V04prmosulu:10: anekabuddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīva sānuṃ /
V04prmosulu:11: udāhariṣyāmy ahaṃ saṃghamadhye hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // 5 //
V04prmosulu:14: pracchādayanti hṛdayaṃ gaganam iva samunnatā meghāḥ //
V04prmosulu:17: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:19: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:23: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ lajjinām abhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:25: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśīlapāpakarmāntāḥ /
V04prmosulu:26: kuṇapam iva samudrato samutkṣiptāḥ śāstu prāvacanāt //
V04prmosulu:27: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te traidhātuke anupaliptāḥ /
V04prmosulu:29: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:31: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:33: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣām ātmaśīlehi ye hy upavadanti /
V04prmosulu:34: sabrahmacāriṇaś ca śastā devamanuṣyāś ca duḥśīlāḥ //
V04prmosulu:35: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīlehi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:36: sarvatra nopavadyā vijñānāṃ vai sadevake loke // 16-17 //
V04prmosulu:37: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ yehi /
V04prmosulu:38: āsevitā ca yehi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
V04prmosulu:39: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
V04prmosulu:41: yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmo gaṇottamo /
V04prmosulu:42: śikṣā uddeśo saṃvāso saṃbhogo śāstuno vacanaṃ //
V04prmosulu:44: paricarya dharmarājaṃ te yānti asaṃskṛtaṃ sthānaṃ // 20-21 //
V04prmosulu:45: śuddhasya vai sadā phalguḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
V04prmosulu:48: tāvat sthāsyati saddharmo sāmagrī ca gaṇottame // 23 //
V04prmosulu:49: yāvac ca deśayitāraḥ pratipattāraś ca dharmaratnasya /
V04prmosulu:51: tasmāt samagrāḥ sahitāḥ sagauravāḥ bhaviyā anyamanyaṃ paricaratha /
V04prmosulu:52: dharmarājam adhigacchatha nirvāṇam atandritā acyutam padam aśokam iti // 25 //
V04prmosulu:54: abhikrāntāḥ suvihitāḥ śuddhā nipuṇā anusaṅgāyanto upaniṣaṇṇā,
V04prmosulu:60: nāsti cātra kaścid anupasaṃpanno nāsti utkḥiptako /
V04prmosulu:72: tad evaṃ samanvāharantu bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:73: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:78: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:79_0: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ
V04prmosulu:79_1: samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśeyyā /
V04prmosulu:81: kariṣyati bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātram atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:89: girinadījalacapalacañcalopamā āyuḥ saṃskārā muhūrttam api nāvatiṣṭhante /
V04prmosulu:92: apramādādhigatānāṃ hi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ /
V04prmosulu:95: daśārthavaśān sampaśyamānās tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti,
V04prmosulu:104: prasannānāṃ ca bhūyobhāvāya dṛṣṭadhārmikāṇām āśravāṇāṃ nirghātāya (8)
V04prmosulu:107: bāhujanyaṃ vivṛtaṃ suprakāśitaṃ yāvad devamanuṣyeṣv iti /
V04prmosulu:108: imān daśārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśanti /
V04prmosulu:110: taṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta /
V04prmosulu:114: tūṣṇīmbhāvena kho punar āyuṣmanto pariśuddhā iti vedayiṣyāmi /
V04prmosulu:115: yathā kho punar āyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam eva rūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:116: yo puna bhikṣu evaṃrūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo se bhavati /
V04prmosulu:117: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punar āyuṣmanto āntarāyiko dharmo ukto bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:118: tasmāt smaramāṇena bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhiprekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkartavyā /
V04prmosulu:123: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:124_0: par.1 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣām apratyākhyāya daurbalyam
V04prmosulu:124_1: anāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyam api
V04prmosulu:124_2: sādham ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:126: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemantapakṣe pañcame,
V04prmosulu:131: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:132_0: par.2 yo puna bhikṣu grāmād vā araṇyād vā adinnam anyātakaṃ stainasaṃskāram ādiyeya
V04prmosulu:132_1: yathārūpeṇādinnādānena [rā]jāno gṛhītvā haneṃsu vā bandheṃsu vā pravrājeṃsu vā hambho
V04prmosulu:132_2: puruṣa coro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si stainyo 'sīti vā vadeṃsu,
V04prmosulu:133: tathārūpaṃ bhikṣur adinnam ādiyamāno ayam pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:135: idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe dvitī[ye,
V04prmosulu:137: paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyām āyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kumbhakārajātīyam ārabhya rājānaṃ ca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukūlikaṃ ca bhikṣaṃ /
V04prmosulu:138: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptir dharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:139: par.3 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya śastrahārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeya,
V04prmosulu:141: maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya Ō hambho puruṣa kiṃ te iminā pāpakena durjīvitena dhigjīvitena,
V04prmosulu:142: mṛtaṃ te jīvitāc chreyo Ō iti cittam alaṃ cittasaṃkalpam anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya,
V04prmosulu:143: so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryān nānyena,
V04prmosulu:144: ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:146: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe tṛtīye,
V04prmosulu:148: paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ sambahulān gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūn ārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrājakaṃ /
V04prmosulu:150: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:151: par.4 yo puna bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ prātajāneya ita jānāmi ita paśyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:152: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asa[ma]nugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣo evam avaci Ō ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto avaci jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:154: iti tucchaṃ mṛṣā vilāpam anyatrābhimānāt* ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:155: idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe caturthe,
V04prmosulu:157: purebhaktaṃ uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhucchapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ saṃbahulān grāmavāsikān bhikṣūn ārabhya ābhiyānikaṃ ca bhikṣuṃ /
V04prmosulu:159: yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:164: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:165: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ito 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:166: yathā pūrve tathā paścād yathā paścāt tathā pūrve pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi saṃvāsaṃ ḥ tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:167: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:168: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:169: pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi ḥ
V04prmosulu:171: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:172: sa.1 saṃcetanikāye śukrasya visṛṣṭīye anyatra svapnāntare saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:173_0: sa.2 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ
V04prmosulu:173_1: samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatarānyatarasya vā punar
V04prmosulu:174: sa.3 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:175_0: sa.4 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye paricaryāye
V04prmosulu:175_1: varṇaṃ bhāṣeya Ō etad agraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmaṃ
V04prmosulu:175_2: brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:176_0: sa.5 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya istriyāye mataṃ puruṣasyopasaṃhareya
V04prmosulu:176_1: puruṣasya vā mataṃ istriyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārtanena vā antamaśato
V04prmosulu:177: sa.6 svayaṃ yācikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārayamāṇena asvāmikātmoddeśikā kuṭī kārāpayitavyā /
V04prmosulu:178: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dvādaśa vitastīyo sugatavitastinā /
V04prmosulu:183: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe svayaṃyācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeya asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudesanāya,
V04prmosulu:186: sa.7 mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā]payamāṇena sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣū cānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya /
V04prmosulu:189: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudeśanāya,
V04prmosulu:191: sa.8 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo,
V04prmosulu:193: anāttamano śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpattikam amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy evaṃ nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:194: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V04prmosulu:195: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:196: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:197: sa.9 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo,
V04prmosulu:199_0: anāttamano anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya kiñcid eva leśamātrakaṃ dharmam upādāya aparājikaṃ
V04prmosulu:199_1: bhikṣuṃ pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy eva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:200: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:201: anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya kocid e[va] leśamātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:202: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:203: sa.10 yo puna bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vādhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya,
V04prmosulu:204: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi,
V04prmosulu:205: bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V04prmosulu:207: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:208: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:210: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:211: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:212: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:213: sa.11 tasya kho puna bhikṣusya bhikṣū sahāyakā bhonti eko vā,
V04prmosulu:214: dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā,
V04prmosulu:216: te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:217: dharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣur vina[ya]vādī caiṣo bhikṣu,
V04prmosulu:218: asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣu cchandaṃ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V04prmosulu:219: yaṃ caitasya bhikṣusya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V04prmosulu:220: jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
V04prmosulu:221: te bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyā Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha,
V04prmosulu:226: ajānan* caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no jānan* /
V04prmosulu:230: samagro hi sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:231: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:232: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:233: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu i[ty e]taṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:234: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:235: sa.12 bhikṣuḥ kho puna durvacakajātīyo bhoti /
V04prmosulu:236: so uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V04prmosulu:237: so evam āha Ō mā me āyuṣmanto kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:238: aham apy āyuṣmantānāṃ na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:240: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V04prmosulu:242: bhikṣū pi āyuṣmantaṃ vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vina[yena] /
V04prmosulu:243: āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn vadatu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V04prmosulu:244: evaṃ saṃbaddhā kho punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyasya vacanīyā,
V04prmosulu:246: evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:247: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:248: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:249: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:250: sa.13 saṃbahulā bhikṣū kho punar anyataraṃ grāmam vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniśrāya viharanti kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ /
V04prmosulu:251: teṣāṃ te pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:252: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:254: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:255: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:257: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:258: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō cchandagāmī cāyuṣmanto doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho,
V04prmosulu:261: saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti /
V04prmosulu:262: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha /
V04prmosulu:267: na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti,
V04prmosulu:269: āyuṣmantānām eva khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:270: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:272: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:273: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:274: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyās tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:275: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ prati[ni]ssareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:276: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:290: uddiṣṭā kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:292: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ato 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā yāvatakaṃ jānan* cchādeti tāvatakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā akāmaparivāsaṃ parivasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:293: parivustaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:294: cīrṇamānatvo bhikṣuḥ kṛtānudharmo āhvayanapratibaddho yatra syād viṃśagaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āhvayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:295: ekabhikṣuṇāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣum āhveya,
V04prmosulu:296: so ca bhikṣu anāhūto te ca bhikṣū garhyāḥ /
V04prmosulu:299: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:300: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:301: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:303: aniy.0 ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:304: aniy.1 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ praticchannāsane alaṃkarmaṇīye eko [ekā]ya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:305: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:306_0: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo
V04prmosulu:306_1: pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā
V04prmosulu:309: aniy.2 na haiva kho punaḥ praticchannāsanaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:311: alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣituṃ pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya /
V04prmosulu:312: tathārūpe ca bhikṣu āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:313: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:314: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā,
V04prmosulu:315: yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya,
V04prmosulu:316: tena tena so bhikṣu dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:321: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:323: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhā?
V04prmosulu:324: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:325: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:327: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissargikapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:328: np.1 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekacīvaraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:331: np.2 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi ced bhikṣuḥ trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra saṃghasaṃmutīye,
V04prmosulu:333: np.3 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:334: pratigṛhṇitvā kṣipram eva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:335: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣusya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya,
V04prmosulu:336: māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye /
V04prmosulu:337: taduttariṃ nikṣipeya santīye vā asantīye vā pratyāśāye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:338: np.4 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇeya anyatra pallaṭṭhakena nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:339: np.5 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeya vā rañjāpeya vā ākoṭāpeya vā nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:340: np.6 yo puna bhikṣur anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ [?
V04prmosulu:341: Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yāceya anyatra samaye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:342: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati /
V04prmosulu:344: np.7 ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputrīṃ [Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yācituṃ /
V04prmosulu:345: tam enam abhihṛṣṭo samāno saṃbahulehi cīvarehi pravāreya,
V04prmosulu:348_0: np.8 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikānāṃ cīvaracetāpanāny
V04prmosulu:348_1: abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpanehi civaraṃ
V04prmosulu:349_0: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho puna
V04prmosulu:349_1: yūyam āyuṣmanto imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha /
V04prmosulu:350: evaṃrūpeṇa vā [evaṃrūpeṇa vā] ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:352: np.9 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye ca pratyekacīvaracetāpanāni abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti,
V04prmosulu:353: abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:354: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣman,
V04prmosulu:356_0: imehi pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ
V04prmosulu:356_1: pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchādetha evaṃrūpeṇa vā evaṃrūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:358: np.10 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣeya /
V04prmosulu:359: so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō imāni khalv āryam uddiśya itthaṃnāmena rājñā ca rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni,
V04prmosulu:361: tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evam asya vacanīyo Ō na kho punar āyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvaracetāpanāni pratigṛhṇituṃ /
V04prmosulu:362: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
V04prmosulu:363: evam ukte so dūto taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya [sa]nti punar ārya kecid bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarāti /
V04prmosulu:364: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiśitavyāḥ ārāmikā vā /
V04prmosulu:365: ete āyuṣman bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarā ye bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
V04prmosulu:366_0: evam ukte so dūto yena vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān evaṃ
V04prmosulu:366_1: vadeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto vaiyāpṛtyakarā imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ
V04prmosulu:366_2: cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:367_0: so ca dūto tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān saṃjñapayitvā yena so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā na
V04prmosulu:367_1: bhikṣum eva vadeya ye khu te āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiṣṭās te mayā saṃjñaptās
V04prmosulu:368: ācchādayiṣyanti te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:369_0: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarārthikena [yena] te vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā
V04prmosulu:369_1: te vaiyāpṛtyakarāḥ sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayitavyā vijñāpayitavyāḥ Ō artho
V04prmosulu:370: sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya ity etat kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:371: no ced abhiniṣpādeya catukkhutto pañcakhutto ṣaṭkhuttoparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇībhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:372: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaṭkkhuttoparamaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:374: no ced abhiniṣpādeya tad uttapanto vā vyāyamanto vā taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:376: no ced abhiniṣpādeya yena se tāni rājñā vā rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tatra tena bhikṣuṇā svayaṃ vā gantavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:378: yāni khu āyuṣmantehi itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni na khu tāni tasya bhikṣusya kiñcid arthaṃ spharanti,
V04prmosulu:391: np.11 yo puna bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:392: np.12 navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ dve bhāgā ādayitavyās tṛtīyo odātikānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ /
V04prmosulu:394: np.13 yo puna bhikṣuḥ kauśeyamiśrāṇām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:395: np.14 navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena akāmaṃ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:396: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pratyoreṇa taṃ purāṇaṃ santhataṃ visarjayitvā vā avisarjayitvā vā anyaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:398: np.15 navaṃ santhataniṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena tato purāṇasanthatāto samantāt sugatavitastinā bhāgo ādayitavyo navasya durvaṇṇīkaraṇārthaṃ /
V04prmosulu:399: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navasanthataṃ niṣīdanaṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:400: np.16 bhikṣusya kho punar adhvānamārge pratipannasya utpadyeṃsu e[ḍa]kalomāni /
V04prmosulu:402: pratigṛhṇitvā sāmaṃ triyojanaparamaṃ hartavyam asante anyasmi[n] hārake taduttariṃ hāreya sante vā asante vā anyasmi[n] hārake,
V04prmosulu:404: np.17 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye eḍakalomādi dhovāpeya vā raṃjāpe[ya] vā vivaṭāpaye vā,
V04prmosulu:406: np.18 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā antamasato iha nikṣipehīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:408: np.19 yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ krayavikrayavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya saṃyyathīdaṃ imaṃ kriṇa ito kriṇa ettakamettake[na krī]ṇāhīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:410: np.20 yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ jātarūparajatavikṛtivyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:425: np.22 yo puna bhikṣu ūnapañcabandhanabaddhena pātreṇa anyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeya kāmātām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:426: tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣāye nissaritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:427: yo tahi bhikṣuparṣāye pātraparyanto bhavati so tasya bhikṣusya anupradātavyo Ō evaṃ te āyuṣman pātro dhārayitavyo yāvad bhedanaṃ,
V04prmosulu:429: np.23 yāni kho punar imāni gilānapratiṣevaṇīyāni bhaiṣajyāni bhavanti sayyathīdaṃ sarpistailamadhuphāṇitaṃ Ō evaṃrūpāṇi gilānena bhikṣuṇā satkṛtyābhigṛhītāni,
V04prmosulu:432: taduttariṃ khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā santaṃ vā śeṣabhū[taṃ] nissareya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:433: np.24 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya cīvaraṃ datvā yathā duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamāno ācchindeya vā ācchindāpayeya vā Ō āhara bhikṣu cīvaraṃ,
V04prmosulu:436: np.25 māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇām iti bhikṣuṇā varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:438: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pra[tyo]reṇa varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣeya,
V04prmosulu:441: np.26 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svayaṃyācikāya sūtraṃ tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:442: np.27 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatiputro vā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya,
V04prmosulu:443: tena ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣmann imaṃ cīvaram āyataṃ ca karohi,
V04prmosulu:448: apy eva nāma vayaṃ pi tava kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃharema,
V04prmosulu:449: māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:450: tatra ca so bhikṣur evaṃ vaditvā na kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃhareya māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:452: np.28 daśāhānāgataṃ kho puna tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī utpadyeya bhikṣusya ātyāyikaṃ cīvaram ātyāyikaṃ manyamāno na bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:455: np.29 upavarṣaṃ kho punaḥ tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī bhikṣu cāraṇyake śayanāsane viharanti samaye sapratibhaye sāśaṃkasaṃmate /
V04prmosulu:456: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyataraṃ cīvaram antaragṛhe nikṣipitavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:457: syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo tasmāc cīvarād vipravāsāya,
V04prmosulu:458: ṣaḍāhaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc cīvarād vipravasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:459: taduttariṃ vipravaseya anyatra bhikṣu saṃmutīye nissargikapācattikam /
V04prmosulu:460: np.30 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikāṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇatam ātmano pariṇāmeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:471: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissarggikapācattikā dharmmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:473: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:474: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:475: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:477: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavatiṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:481_0: pac.4 yo puna bhikṣur jānaṃ saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni dharmeṇa vinayena vihitāni vyupaśāntāni
V04prmosulu:481_1: punaḥ karmāya utkhoṭeya Ō idaṃ punaḥ karma kartavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti Ō etad eva pratyayaṃ
V04prmosulu:481_2: kṛtvā ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya utkhoṭanaṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:482: pac.5 yo puna bhikṣur akalpiyakāro mātṛgrāmasya dharmaṃ deśeya uttari cchahi pañcahi vācāhi anyatra vijñapuruṣapudgalena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:483: pac.6 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannaṃ pudgalaṃ padaśo dharmaṃ vāceya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:484_0: pac.7 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam
V04prmosulu:484_1: alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ pratijāneya Ō iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti bhūtasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:485: pac.8 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattim anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike āroceya anyatra kṛtāye prakāśanāsaṃmutīye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:486: pac.9 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike lābhe bhājīyamāne pūrve samanujño bhūtvā paścāt kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya Ō yathāsaṃstutam evāyuṣmanto,
V04prmosulu:487: jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmayatīti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:488_0: pac.10 yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō kiṃ
V04prmosulu:488_1: punar āyuṣmanto imehi kṣudrānukṣūdrehi śikṣāpadehi uddiṣṭehi yāvad eva bhikṣūṇāṃ
V04prmosulu:503_0: pac.14 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre abhyavakāśe mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā viśikaṃ
V04prmosulu:503_1: vā caturaśrakaṃ vā kurcaṃ vā bimbohanaṃ vā prajñāpetvā vā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā,
V04prmosulu:506: pac.15 yo punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre antośayyāṃ prajñāpetvā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā,
V04prmosulu:509: pac.16 yo punar bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano sāṃghikād bhikṣuvihārād bhikṣuṃ nikaḍḍheya vā nikaḍḍhāpeya vā antamasato neha bhikṣū ti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:510: pac.17 yo puna bhikṣu sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre jānan bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvaprajñaptāhi śayyāhi paścād āgatvā madhyeśayyāṃ prajñāpeya yasyodvahiṣyati so prakramiṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:513: pac.18 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre upari vaihāyasakuṭikāye āhatya pādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:514: pac.19 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñceya vā siñcāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:515_0: pac.20 mahallakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ chādāpayamānena yāvad dvārakoṣārgalapratiṣṭhānam
V04prmosulu:515_1: ālokasandhiparikarmam upādāya dve vā trayo vā cchādanaparyāyā adhiṣṭhihitavyāḥ alpaharite sthitena /
V04prmosulu:516: taduttariṃ adhiṣṭhiheya alpaharite sthito pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:528: pac.21 yo puna bhikṣu asaṃmato bhikṣuṇīm ovadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:529: pac.22 saṃmato vāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣūṇīm ovadeya vikāle,
V04prmosulu:532: pac.23 yo puna bhikṣu ovādaprekṣo bhikṣuṇīupāśrayam upasaṃkrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:534: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānā bhikṣuṇī ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā bhavati /
V04prmosulu:536: pac.24 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō āmiṣahetor āyuṣman bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīṃ te ovadatīti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:537: pac.25 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:538: pac.26 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:541: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō mārgo bhavati sabhayo sapratibhayo sāśaṃkasaṃmato /
V04prmosulu:543: pac.27 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvāṃ abhiruheya ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:545: pac.28 yo puna bhikṣu anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra pallaṭṭhakena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:546: pac.29 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ sīveya vā sīvāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:547: pac.30 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ pinḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeya,
V04prmosulu:559: pac.31 ekāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā agilānena āvasathapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjitavyo,
V04prmosulu:564: pac.33 yo puna bhikṣur bhuṃjāvī pravārito utthito āsanāto,
V04prmosulu:565: anatiriktaṃ kṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:566: pac.34 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣu bhuktāvī pravāritam utthitam āsanāto āsādanāprekṣo anatiriktakṛtena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā upanimantreya,
V04prmosulu:567: ehi bhikṣu khādāhi bhuṃjāhīti vā vadeya bhuktasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:568: pac.35 yo puna bhikṣur adinnam apratigrāhitaṃ mukhadvārikam āhāram āhāreya anyatrodakadantapoṇe pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:571: pac.38 bhikṣuṃ kho punaḥ kulehi upasaṃkrāntaṃ pravāreṃsu pūpehi vā manthehi vā /
V04prmosulu:574: bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā khāditavyaṃ bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:575: taduttariṃ pratigṛhṇitvā bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā vā asaṃvibhajitvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:576_0: pac.39 yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni bhavanti saṃyyathīdaṃ sarpistailaṃ
V04prmosulu:576_1: madhu phāṇitaṃ dugdhaṃ dadhi matsyaṃ māṃsaṃ yo puna bhikṣur evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītasaṃmatāni
V04prmosulu:576_2: bhojanāni ātmārthāya agilāno kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:578: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānasamayo cīvaradānakālasamayo adhvānagamanasamayo nāvābhirohaṇasamayo mahāsamayo śravaṇabhaktaṃ /
V04prmosulu:589_0: pac.41 yo puna bhikṣur ātmārthāya agilāno jyotismiṃ vitāpanāprekṣo tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ
V04prmosulu:589_1: vā gomayaṃ vā sakalikāṃ vā tuṣaṃ vā saṃkāraṃ vā ādaheya vā ādahāpeya vā anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:590: pac.42 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ uttari dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:591: pac.43 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ karmaṇā cchandaṃ datvā paścād duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano evaṃ vadeya Ō adinno me chando,
V04prmosulu:593: akṛtāny etāni karmāṇi duṣkṛtāny etāni karmāṇi,
V04prmosulu:594: nāham eteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ cchandaṃ demīti vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:595: pac.44 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō ehi tvam āyuṣman grāmaṃ pinḍāya praviśiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:596: ahaṃ ca te tatra kiṃcid dāpayiṣyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:597: so tatra tasya kiñcid dāpayitvā vā adāpayitvā vā paścād udyojanaprekṣo evaṃ vadeya Ō gaccha tvam āyuṣman na me tvayā sārdhaṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā,
V04prmosulu:598: ekasyaiva mama phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā /
V04prmosulu:601: pac.45 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya /
V04prmosulu:602: tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:603: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:605: antarāyikā evāyuṣman dharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā,
V04prmosulu:606: alaṃ ca punas tān pratiṣevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:607: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:608: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:609: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:610: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣipitavyo /
V04prmosulu:612_0: pac.46 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ tathā utkṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa
V04prmosulu:612_1: vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ
V04prmosulu:612_2: saṃbhuñjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:613: pac.47 śramaṇuddeso pi ced evaṃ vadeya tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā kāmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:614: so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:616: antarāyikā evāyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa kāmāḥ samānā antarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:617: alaṃ ca punas tān pratisevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:618: evaṃ ca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:619_0: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo
V04prmosulu:619_1: tasya vastusya pratinissargāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo
V04prmosulu:619_2: vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:620: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi nāśayitavyo Ō adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho śāstā vyapadiśitavyo /
V04prmosulu:621: yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyadagreṇa nāsti /
V04prmosulu:623_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇuddeśaṃ yathāvādīṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ
V04prmosulu:623_1: dṛṣṭim apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ upasthāpeya vā upalāpeya vā saṃbhuṃjeya vā
V04prmosulu:623_2: saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:624: pac.48 navacīvaralābhinā bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatarānyataraṃ durvaṇīkaraṇam ādayitavyaṃ Ō nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kālaśyāmaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:625: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:626: pac.49 yo puna bhikṣur anyatra adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā,
V04prmosulu:628: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā udgṛhṇitavyaṃ vā udgṛhṇāpayitavyaṃ vā Ō yasya bhaviṣyati so hariṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:633: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō dvyardho māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ,
V04prmosulu:634: varṣāṇāṃ ca purimo māso ity ete aḍḍhātīyamāsāḥ,
V04prmosulu:650: pac.51 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:651: pac.52 yo puna bhikṣu acelakasya vā acelikāya vā parivrājakasya vā parivrājakāye vā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:652: pac.53 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:653: pac.54 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule praticchannāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:654: pac.55 yo puna bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya gaccheya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:655: pac.56 syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo senāyāṃ gamanāya,
V04prmosulu:656: dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā tena bhikṣuṇā senāyāṃ vasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:658: pac.57 tatrāpi ca bhikṣu dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā senāyāṃ vasamāno āyūhikaṃ vā niyūddhikaṃ vā anekavyūhaṃ vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣaṃ vā darśanāya gaccheya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:659: pac.58 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṃ prahareya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:660: pac.59 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya talaśaktikām āvarjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:661: pac.60 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ cchādeya,
V04prmosulu:662: so na pareṣām āroceya kiṃ ti se mā pare jānantū ti /
V04prmosulu:674: pac.61 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:675: pac.62 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya saṃcintya kaukṛtyam upasaṃhareya kiṃ ti se muhūrtaṃ pi aphāsu bhavatū ti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:676: pac.63 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerīye vā śikṣamāṇāye vā cīvaraṃ datvā apratyuddhareya paribhuṃjeya,
V04prmosulu:678: pac.64 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā niṣīdanaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ vā apaniheya vā apanihāpeya vā antamaśato hāsyārthaṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:679: pac.65 yo puna bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣeya pācattikam /
V04prmosulu:682: pac.68 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:683: pac.69 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:684: pac.70 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:693: pac.71 yo puna bhikṣur jānan ūnaviṃśativarṣapudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāya upasaṃpādeya,
V04prmosulu:697: pac.72 yo puna bhikṣur jānan stainyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:698: pac.73 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khaneya vā khanāpeya vā antamaśato iha khanehīti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:703: pac.75 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evaṃ vucyamāno Ō imehi te āyuṣman pañcahi āpattikāyehi anadhyāvācāya śikṣā karaṇīyeti,
V04prmosulu:704_0: so bhikṣu tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya Ō na yāvad aham āyuṣmantānāṃ vacanena śikṣiṣyaṃ
V04prmosulu:704_1: yāvad ahaṃ na drakṣyāmi sthavirān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān madhyamān
V04prmosulu:706: tāṃs tāvad aham upasaṃkramya paripṛcchiṣyaṃ paripraśnīkariṣyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:711: pac.78 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi kalahajātehi bhaṇḍanajātehi vigrahavivādāpannehi viharantehi upaśrotrasthāne tiṣṭheya Ō yaṃ ete vadiṣyanti taṃ paścād upasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:715: pac.79 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃghe viniścayakathāhi vartamānāhi utthāyāsanāt prakrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:717: pac.80 yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayyāsane viharanto vikāle grāmaṃ praviśeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:731: pac.81 yo puna bhikṣu sabhakto samāno purebhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ vā kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:735: pac.82 yo puna bhikṣu rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya antaḥpuraṃ praviśeyāniṣkrānte rājāne,
V04prmosulu:737: anirgatehi ratanehi antamaśato indrakīlaṃ pi atikrameya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:738: pac.83 yo puna bhikṣu dantamayaṃ vā asthimayaṃ vā śṛṅgamayaṃ vā suvarṇamayaṃ vā rūpyamayaṃ vā ratanamayaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya bhedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:739: pac.84 mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ anyatrāṭṭanīye,
V04prmosulu:741: pac.85 yo puna bhikṣuḥ tūlasaṃstṛte mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhi[ni]padyeya vā uddālanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:742: pac.86 niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:743: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag dvyardham anyatra daśavitastikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:745: pac.87 kaṇḍūpraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:746: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryag dve /
V04prmosulu:748: pac.88 varṣāśāṭikā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā /
V04prmosulu:749: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā,
V04prmosulu:752: pac.89 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya Ō kiñca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ?
V04prmosulu:753: dirghaśo nava vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryak ṣaṭ /
V04prmosulu:754: idaṃ tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ /
V04prmosulu:755: tato vā punar uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:756: pac.90 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano amūlakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:757: pac.91 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:758: pac.92 yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō adya punar ahaṃ jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:759: idānīṃ punar ahaṃ jānāmi Ō ayaṃ pi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchati /
V04prmosulu:760: yāvad ahaṃ na jānāmi tāvan nāstītthaṃ mahyam āpattir jāneṃsu ca te bhikṣu taṃ bhikṣuṃ sakṛd dvikkhuto trikkhuto āgatapūrvaṃ pi sanniṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:762: nāsti kho punas tasya bhikṣusya ajñānena muktiḥ /
V04prmosulu:763: atha khu yāṃ pi ca so bhikṣur āpattim āpanno tāṃ kṣipram eva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo,
V04prmosulu:765: tasya te āyuṣman lābhā durlabdhā yas tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne nāsthīkṛtvā na manasikṛtvā na sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya avahitaśroto satkṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣīti /
V04prmosulu:785: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavati śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:787: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:788: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:789: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:791: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:792: pratid.1 yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayanāsane viharanto pūrve apratisaṃveditaṃ bahirdhā apratigṛhītaṃ,
V04prmosulu:793_0: antovāsavastusminn agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya
V04prmosulu:793_1: vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman
V04prmosulu:796_0: pratid.2 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye antaragṛhaṃ praviṣṭāye agilāno svahastaṃ
V04prmosulu:796_1: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena
V04prmosulu:796_2: bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:799: pratid.3 bhikṣu kho punar antaragṛhe nimantritakā bhuñjanti /
V04prmosulu:800: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī viśvāsamānarūpā sthitā bhavati /
V04prmosulu:801: sā evam āha Ō iha odanaṃ dehi,
V04prmosulu:804: sarvehi tehi bhikṣuhi sā bhikṣuṇī evam asya vacanīyā Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti /
V04prmosulu:805: ekabhikṣū pi ca tāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ neva vadeya Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti,
V04prmosulu:806: bhuktāvīhi tehi bhikṣūhi pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:809_0: pratid.4 yāni kho punar imāni śaikṣasaṃmatāni kulāni bhavanti tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrve
V04prmosulu:809_1: apravārito upasaṃkramitvā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya
V04prmosulu:809_2: vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman
V04prmosulu:816: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:818: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:819: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:820: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:822: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:823: sai.1 parimaṇḍalaṃ nivasanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:824: sai.2 parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:825: sai.3 susaṃvṛto antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:826: sai.4 na utkṣiptacakṣur antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:827: sai.5 alpaśabdo antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:828: sai.6 na uccagghikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:829: sai.7 na oguṇṭhikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:830: sai.8 na utkṣiptikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:831: sai.9 na utkuṭukāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:832: sai.10 na khambhakṛto antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:833: sai.11 na kāyapracālakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:834: sai.12 na śīrṣapracālakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:835: sai.13 na bāhuvikṣepakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:850: sai.14 susaṃvṛto antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:851: sai.15 na utkṣiptacakṣu antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:852: sai.16 alpaśabdo antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:853: sai.17 na uccagghikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:854: sai.18 na oguṇṭhikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:855: sai.19 na utkṣiptikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:856: sai.20 na osaktikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:857: sai.21 na pallatthikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:858: sai.22 na khambhakṛto antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:859: sai.23 na antaragṛhe niṣaṇṇo hastakaukṛtyaṃ pādakaukṛtyaṃ vā kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:871: sai.24 satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:872: sai.25 samasūpaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:873: sai.26 na stūpakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:874: sai.27 nāvakīrṇakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:875: sai.28 nāvagaṇḍakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:876: sai.29 na jihvānicārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:877: sai.30 nātimahantehi kavaḍehi piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:878: sai.31 nānāgate kavaḍe mukhadvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:879: sai.32 na kavaḍotkṣepakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:880: sai.33 na kavaḍacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:881: sai.34 na sakavaḍena mukhena vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyamīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:894: sai.35 na pātranirlehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:895: sai.36 na hastanirlehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:896: sai.37 nāṅgulinirlehakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:897: sai.38 na cuccukāraṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:898: sai.39 na surusurukāraṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:899: sai.40 na gulugulukārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:900: sai.41 na hastanirdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:902: sai.42 na sitthāpakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:903: sai.43 nātivelaṃ parasya pātraṃ nidhyāyiṣyāmi odhyāyanakarmatām upādāyeti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:904: sai.44 na pātrasaṃjñī piṇḍapātaṃ pari[bhuṃji]ṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:905: sai.45 na agilāno odanaṃ vā sūpaṃ vā vyañjanaṃ vā ātmārthāya kulehi vijñāpetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:906: sai.46 na dinnadinnāni vyaṃjanāni odanena pracchādayiṣyāmi bhūyo āgamanakarmatām upādāyeti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:907: sai.47 na sasitthaṃ pātrodakaṃ pṛthivyāṃ niṣiñciṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:908: sai.48 na sasitthena pāṇinā pānīyasthālakaṃ pratigṛhṇiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:923: sai.49 na sthito niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:924: sai.50 na niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:925: sai.51 na nīcāsane niṣaṇṇo uccāsane niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:926: sai.52 na upānahārūḍhasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:927: sai.53 na pādukārūḍhasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:928: sai.54 na oguṇṭhikākṛtasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:929: sai.55 na saṃmukhāveṣṭitasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:930: sai.56 na osaktikāya niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:931: sai.57 na pallatthikāya niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:942: sai.58 na śastrapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:943: sai.59 nāyudhapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:944: sai.60 na daṇḍapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:945: sai.61 na cchatrapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:946: sai.62 na utpathena gacchanto pathena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:947: sai.63 na pṛṣṭhato gacchanto purato gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:948: sai.64 na pādena gacchanto yānena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:949: sai.65 na harite tṛṇe uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃhāṇaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:950: sai.66 na udake uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃhāṇakaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:951: sai.67 na sthito uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:962: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:964: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:965: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:966: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:968: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti ye utpannotpannānām adhikaraṇānāṃ śamathāya vyapaśamathāya saṃvartante /
V04prmosulu:977: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇaśamathā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:979: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:980: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:981: pariśuddhā atrāyuḥmanto yasmāt tūḥṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:983: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ Ō dharmo anudharmaś ca anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:984: tatra dharmo nāma yam ubhayato vinayo /
V04prmosulu:986: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ dharmo anudharmaś ca /
V04prmosulu:988: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:989: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:990: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:991: uddiṣṭaṃ kho punar āyuṣmanto prātimokṣasya vastu /
V04prmosulu:1003: etako 'yaṃ punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmavinayo prātimokṣasūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno /
V04prmosulu:1004_0: yo vā anyo 'pi kaścid dharmasya anudharmo tatra samagrehi sarvehi sahitehi saṃmodamānehi
V04prmosulu:1004_1: avivadamānehi ekuddeśehi kṣīrodakībhūtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānehi sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ
V04prmosulu:1005: v.1 kṣāntiḥ paramaṃ tapo titikṣā nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
V04prmosulu:1006: na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śravaṇo bhoti parān viheṭhayānaḥ //
V04prmosulu:1007: idaṃ tasya bhagavato vipaśyisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
V04prmosulu:1008: v.2 anopavādī aparopaghātī prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro /
V04prmosulu:1009: mātrajñatā ca bhaktasmiṃ prāntaṃ ca śayanāsanaṃ /
V04prmosulu:1011: idaṃ tasya bhagavato śikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:1012: v.3 adhicetasi mā pramādyato munino maunapadeṣu śikṣataḥ /
V04prmosulu:1013: śokā na bhavanti tāyino upaśāntasya sadā smṛtīmataḥ //
V04prmosulu:1014: idaṃ tasya bhagavato viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:1017: idaṃ tasya bhagavato krakucchandasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:1018: v.5 yathā hi bhramaro puṇyaṃ varṇagandham aheṭhayaṃ /
V04prmosulu:1019: paraiti rasam ādāya evaṃ grāme muniś caret //
V04prmosulu:1020: v.6 na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtaṃ /
V04prmosulu:1021: ātmano tu samīkṣeta kṛtāny akṛtāni ca //
V04prmosulu:1022: idaṃ tasya bhagavato konākamunisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V04prmosulu:1023: v.7 nāsti dhyānam aprajñasya prajñā nāsti adhyāyato /
V04prmosulu:1024: yasya dhyānaṃ ca prajñā ca sa vai nirvāṇasya antike //
V04prmosulu:1025: v.8 tatrāyam ādi bhavati ihaprajñasya bhikṣuṇo /
V04prmosulu:1026: indriyai guptiḥ saṃtuṣṭiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro //
V04prmosulu:1027: v.9 mitraṃ bhajeta kalyāṇaṃ śuddhājīvīm atandritaṃ /
V04prmosulu:1029: tataḥ prāmodya bahulo bhikṣu nirvāṇasyaiva antike //
V04prmosulu:1030: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
V04prmosulu:1031: v.10 cakṣuṣā saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ /
V04prmosulu:1032: ghrāṇena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ jihvāya saṃvaraḥ //
V04prmosulu:1033: v.11 kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ manasā sādhu saṃvaraḥ /
V04prmosulu:1035: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śākyādhirājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V04prmosulu:1037: kīrtitāny aprameyāṇi ........... tiṣṭam a ......... ṇāś ca //
V04prmosulu:1045: ete sapta daśabalā mahāprajñā amitabuddhī saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām abhinnān .... lokākhyādhipatīnāṃ dharmākhyānāni uktāni /
V04prmosulu:1050: samāptaṃ prātimokṣasūtraṃ āryamahāsāṃghikānāṃ lokottaravādināṃ madhyoddeśikānāṃ pāṭha iti //
V04prmosulu:1051: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ pi teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat* /
V04prmosulu:1052: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśravaṇaḥ /
